title: Anyone else having this problem?
body:
I get into champ select and everyone picks their champs, alright just waiting on the final timer so we can get into a game. I usually see the League logo around 2-4 seconds after the champ select closes and then I get into the match and load in fairly quickly. However today I did all that and nothing popped up, no logo no nothing. So I waited patiently for a while but still no logo, so now I obviously think my game has crashed, so I task manager it and end all the processes and try logging in again and I hit the reconnect button. Still nothing. Well okay that's no big deal I'm patient. So now I've restarted my computer, tried logging in but by this time my team agreed to a remake and I suffer the consequence of being AFK when I simply had troubles loading in. This isn't a complaint and I honestly don't care if I get a Leaverbuster warning about this. So wondering if this was all on my end or if anyone else has this problem. (I've also tried loading into custom games with bots and still no logo, no screen popup, nothing.) 
Hope to hear from someone soon as I would love to get back on the rift! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: After champion select, your network establishes a connection to the game server.  It looks like something changed with your network, and you aren't able to connect to your specific game server.  I suggest going over the instructions on our[ connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get you fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions or issues afterward.
I did finally get it to work and everything seems to be working fine now, thanks for the help Porocles!

I'm not exactly sure what happened today as in why it wouldn't open but no changes made to my network, still using what I used yesterday (when it worked fine) but thank you for the reply, I'll try what's listed on the connection guide and let you know if my issue has been resolved

I have the same exact problem i tried to terminate all processes of lol and i restart the PC and after it i got a popping window telling me that there is a corruption on my  game and i select fix it, but i still have the same problem plz help :(
